TopicTitle: Humble Bundle Sale March 13th until 8:10pm ET 40% off ($17.99)

Articles.Content:
Until 8:10pm ET tonight (March 13) Humble Bundle has Kerbal Space Program for 40% off ($17.99):

[https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/kerbalspaceprogram_storefront](https://www.humblebundle.com/store/p/kerbalspaceprogram_storefront)
I think I misread, these offers are good for 2-1/2 days, not 2-1/2 hours. So like 1pm ET Monday.

Wow, that's *cheap*! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If you don't have it, or a friend wants it, now's definitely the time to buy!
